name: Prisoner of Ice
description:
Board the H.M.S. Victoria for a voyage to places beyond your wildest imagination! From the icy wastelands of Antarctica, to secret German military camps and Buenos Aires espionage, this supernatural action adventure is sure to pique your obsession with horror and intrigue.

You're in charge of your own destiny but beware - the twisted events of your voyage will take you to task at every turn. Take the risk. Teleport yourself across the globe to a Socerer's cave, unleash the secrets of aliens frozen in ice or solve the case of smuggled "Top Secret" cargo. Prepare to face the most chilling adventure on ice. Remember, you're one step ahead of capture, one step behind horror!
